participant_1.background:
I have four sisters.
My mom is my best friend.
I love iced tea.
I believe that mermaids are real.

participant_2.background:
I just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.
I am twenty two years old.
I just moved into an apartment within the vicinity of my new job.
I just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.
I love children.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am excited to be talking to you.
I am happy to hear that! I am excited to be talking to you too.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, write, and play video games. I also love to spend time with my family and friends.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read and write too. I also enjoy playing video games, but I don't get to do it as often as I would like.
I know what you mean. I have to make time to fit it in, but it's always worth it.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, the Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series. I also love to read books about history and science.
Those are great books! I love the Harry Potter series too. I also love to read books about history and science.
It's nice to meet someone else who loves to read!
Me too! It's always fun to talk to someone about books.
I agree. What are some of your favorite video games?
I love the Assassin's Creed series, the Call of Duty series, and the Grand Theft Auto series. I also enjoy playing online games with my friends.
Those are great games! I love the Assassin's Creed series too. I also enjoy playing online games with my friends.
It's nice to meet someone else who loves video games!
Me too! It's always fun to talk to someone about games.
What are some of your favorite things to do with your family and friends?
I love to go on hikes, go to the beach, and play board games. I also love to go out to eat with them.
Those sound like great things to do! I love to go hiking, go to the beach, and play board games too. I also love to go out to eat with my family and friends.
It's nice to meet someone else who loves to do the same things with their family and friends.
